body_html: Not sure if it's related, but how does the Unified Memory Access feature of CUDA play a role in this? It would be nice if we just return a memory slice to user, with a tag specifying it on device or main memory.

body: Not sure if it's related, but how does the Unified Memory Access feature of CUDA play a role in this? It would be nice if we just return a memory slice to user, with a tag specifying it on device or main memory.
